title: Strange Light from a Passing Storm
content:
Cape Cod got a pretty good storm. It passed by us leaving a little rain and some awesome light.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015211630im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/DSC_6784small_5964.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015211630im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/DSC_6741finalsmall_3548.jpg)

Sharon
author: Sharon Van Lieu

comments.content:
A little bit later on the other side of the island...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015211630im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/DSC_6825_600_3493.jpg)
